author: cms-L1TK
body:
#### PR description:

This fixes a bug in PurgeDuplicate.cc , which has been present since CMSSW 13_2, and which affected the extended (i.e. displaced) L1 tracking. On ttbar+200PU and for Pt > 2 GeV, the performance of the extended L1 tracking is:

# Before bug fix:

efficiency = 96.33 +- 0.12%
tracks/event = 333

# After bug fix:

efficiency = 96.55 +- 0.12%
tracks/event = 270

The PR also includes minor changes to a ROOT plotting macro.
title: Fix bug in L1 track duplicate removal for displaced tracking
